name: com.electricdrill.simple-rpg-core
description: A library that provides common RPG constructs manipulating health, statistics, and damage. It comes with the support for defyining damage types and the matematical functions that reduce a certain damage type on the base of the value of a certain statistic. All developed in a data drive fashior, leveraging on the flexibility of Scriptable Objects

samples.description: A simple example of how to use Simple RPG Core
A pre-built set of instances that can be used in your project
